arts.ttl: Tottenham v Villarreal: Champions League – live
arts.sum: ⚽ Champions League latest updates, 8pm BST kick-off ⚽ Live scores | Follow us over on Bluesky | And mail Scott Tottenham Hotspur’s bonus prize for winning last season’s Europa League begins here. They open their Champions League campaign against the 2021 Europa League winners Villarreal. The two clubs can share their war stories of seeing off Manchester United later, but for now there’s a match to be played. The first meeting of the pair kicks off at 8pm UK time. It’s on! Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Tottenham vs Villarreal: Spanish side expecting ‘tough challenge’ as they chase ‘their English ghost’
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur host Villarreal this evening for the start of the Champions League, and there’s plenty of Spanish excitement about the fixture. Sport provide the latest today, explaining that Villarreal are ‘chasing their English ghost’ against Ange Postecoglou’s side as they’ve not won in England since beating Everton 2-1 in 2005. arts.ttl: Tottenham Hotspur vs Villarreal – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Champions League football returns to the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium on Tuesday as Spurs host Villarreal in their opening group stage match. The fixture presents a fascinating clash of historical records. Tottenham have a dreadful record against Spanish opposition, with just one win in their last 13 European games. arts.ttl: Tottenham Hotspur vs Villarreal – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur mark their return to the Champions League on Tuesday, a reward for their triumphant Europa League campaign last season. That European success, which ended a 17-year trophy drought, came in stark contrast to their domestic form, where the club finished a dismal 17th in the Premier League.
